message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can't afford $15,000. I would like to propose a price of $10,000.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $15,000 is a bit steep for you. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $13,500.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $12,000.
